text: Killer Drag Queens on Dope is a 2003 low budget comedy written, produced, and directed by Lazar Saric. The film stars Alexis Arquette (also known as Eva Destruction) and Omar Alexis as two drugged up drag queens who work as contract killers. ==Cast== * Eva Destruction as Ginger * Omar Alexis as Coco * Clark Weaver as Roy * Macky Beltzkovsky as Anthony * Mario Diaz as Bobby * Don Edmonds as Uncle A * Don Lucas as Richie * Haji as Moonji * Lawrence Hilton- Jacobs as Mr. Fly ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:2003 comedy films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American LGBT-related films Category:American independent films Category:American comedy films Category:Drag (clothing)-related films
title: Killer Drag Queens on Dope
